metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010016 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Dolibarr 6.0.4 is affected by: Cross Site Scripting (XSS). The impact is:Cookie stealing. The component is: htdocs/product/stats/card.php. Theattack vector is: Victim must click a specially crafted link sent by theattacker.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
